message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I think this is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $15000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me is $15000.
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer! I understand your perspective, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a compromise. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'd be willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $10500?

Hi Bob, I understand your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable going that low. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you $11000. It's the best I can do. What do you think?
